name: 尹秦清
objective:
本課程之目的在訓練學生，使學生熟悉經常使用之統計方法與理論，能利用已知之資料整理、分析未知之現象，打好修習其他相關學科之基礎。課程內容包括：機率理論、推定、假設檢定、迴歸分析、變異數分析等。
The purpose of this course is to train the students who can be familiar with the statistics approaches and theories. Besides, they will be able to employ the collected data to analyze the unknown environments. The course includes probability theory, testing, regression analysis and variance analysis.
schedule:
1. Course Introduction
2. Sampling and Sampling Distribution I
3. Sampling and Sampling Distribution II
4. Interval Estimation I
5. Interval Estimation II
6. Quiz I
7. Hypothesis Test I
8. Hypothesis Test II
9. Midterm Exam in class 
10. Inference about Means and Proportions with Two Populations I
11. Inference about Means and Proportions with Two Populations II
12. Inferences about Population Variances I
13. Inferences about Population Variances II
14. Quiz II
15. Comparing Multiple Proportions, Test of Independence and Goodness of Fit I
16. Comparing Multiple Proportions, Test of Independence and Goodness of Fit II
17. Recapitulation & Homework Assignments Review	
18. Final Exam in class
materials: Jeffrey D. Camm; James J. Cochran; Michael J. Fry; Jeffrey W. Ohlmann; David R. Anderson; Dennis J. Sweeney; Thomas A. Williams (2023), 統計學 (Statistics for Business & Economics), 15th Edition, Cengage Learning. 【陳可杰、黃聯海 譯】
